name: Mercado Bitcoin
introduce: Founded in 2013, Mercado Bitcoin describes itself as an alternative asset trading platform in Latin America. Mercado Bitcoin supports Brazilian Reals (BRL), offering BRL pairs for BTC, ETH, XRP, BCH, LTC, and USDC. MB has launched in 2019 MB Digital Assets, an asset tokenization initiative that has issued more than BRL 25 MM in asset-backed tokens.
